item.description: Josie's is a little neighborhood bar located on main St in Everett. Nothing special, not the fanciest of places, they have great karaoke on Friday Nights. Either DJ Dave or Jodi hosts each week, they have a great song selection, up to date material, professional sound system. We get a great local crown plenty of local flavor and a few characters as well. We have a short and sweet rotation but would like to expand that. So if singing is your thing, Josie's the place to be.I know there are plenty of other options for Karaoke on Friday, but I know those places tend to have long rotations, so if you like to sing check us out, we start at 9pm come on down and kick a few out here, or drop by later and kick out a few too. Hope to see you there....
item.name: Karaoke This Friday and Every Friday night at Josie's Place
